name: commander-deck-generator-tools
description: Administration tools for the Commander Deck Generator

scripts.help:
echo "Available commands:
  npm run retag [-- options]   - Re-tag all cards with comprehensive system
  npm run fetch [-- options]   - Fetch new cards from Scryfall

For detailed options, run:
  node retag-database.js --help
  node fetch-new-cards.js --help"

author: Commander Deck Generator
